attributes.name: Contingency Plan
attributes.description: "As far as plans go, this wasn't the worst. It wasn't the best, either."
attributes.parsed_description: "As far as plans go, this wasn't the worst. It wasn't the best, either."

attributes.name: Conversion
attributes.description: "You will see my side of things very soon."
attributes.parsed_description: "You will see my side of things very soon."

attributes.name: Coral Lash
attributes.description: "When faced wtih a shortage of steel, the Siren's crew had to get creative."
attributes.parsed_description: "When faced wtih a shortage of steel, the Siren's crew had to get creative."

attributes.name: Corpsebride's Cleaver
attributes.description: "On the day of her wedding she sliced off her husband's hands so that he could never grasp another woman again."
attributes.parsed_description: "On the day of her wedding she sliced off her husband's hands so that he could never grasp another woman again."

attributes.name: Corpse Bride's Command
attributes.description: "The corpse bride ordered her servants to go forth and carry out her judgement on those she deemed unfaithful."
attributes.parsed_description: "The corpse bride ordered her servants to go forth and carry out her judgement on those she deemed unfaithful."

attributes.name: Corpse Reaver's Rifle
attributes.description: "Look at all the corpses littering the ground. You think you can stand up to me?"
attributes.parsed_description: "Look at all the corpses littering the ground. You think you can stand up to me?"

attributes.name: Corrupted Brute's Waraxe
attributes.description: "The corruption infused this man with extraordinary strength, making him quite the foe. The power with which he swung his axe was unmatched."
attributes.parsed_description: "The corruption infused this man with extraordinary strength, making him quite the foe. The power with which he swung his axe was unmatched."

attributes.name: Corrupted Captain's Pike
attributes.description: "A brave captain, beloved by all who knew him. Like all the others, he too succumbed to the alure of corruption."
attributes.parsed_description: "A brave captain, beloved by all who knew him. Like all the others, he too succumbed to the alure of corruption."

attributes.name: Corrupted Chopper
attributes.description: "The pursuit of power has led many to tamper with forces they do not fully understand."
attributes.parsed_description: "The pursuit of power has led many to tamper with forces they do not fully understand."

attributes.name: Corrupted Core
attributes.description: "The heart of the warhammer is a sphere of corrupted energy. It pulses as its tendrils grasp the edges of the grip, reaching into the heart of whoever wields the weapon."
attributes.parsed_description: "The heart of the warhammer is a sphere of corrupted energy. It pulses as its tendrils grasp the edges of the grip, reaching into the heart of whoever wields the weapon."

attributes.name: Corrupted Culler
attributes.description: "Succumb to the whispers of the void. Let go of your worldly tethers."
attributes.parsed_description: "Succumb to the whispers of the void. Let go of your worldly tethers."

attributes.name: Corrupted Heartshot
attributes.description: "Corruption will take your heart one way or another."
attributes.parsed_description: "Corruption will take your heart one way or another."

attributes.name: Corrupted Hulking Battleaxe
attributes.description: "Despite the massive size of this weapon, the void seems to make it somewhat lighter to carry."
attributes.parsed_description: "Despite the massive size of this weapon, the void seems to make it somewhat lighter to carry."

attributes.name: Corrupted Life Staff
attributes.description: "Corruption overpowers the holy magic of this staff."
attributes.parsed_description: "Corruption overpowers the holy magic of this staff."

attributes.name: Corrupted Mage's Spellstaff
attributes.description: "Forbidden magic is imbued heavily into this staff, enchanted by a rebellious sorcerer eons ago."
attributes.parsed_description: "Forbidden magic is imbued heavily into this staff, enchanted by a rebellious sorcerer eons ago."

attributes.name: Corrupted Musket
attributes.description: "Nik slept with one of these under his pillow. After a week he ran off into the woods while clawing his own eyes out... so maybe keep it in the closet at night instead, eh?"
attributes.parsed_description: "Nik slept with one of these under his pillow. After a week he ran off into the woods while clawing his own eyes out... so maybe keep it in the closet at night instead, eh?"

attributes.name: Corrupted Musket
attributes.description: "Nik slept with one of these under his pillow. After a week he ran off into the woods while clawing his own eyes out... so maybe keep it in the closet at night instead, eh?"
attributes.parsed_description: "Nik slept with one of these under his pillow. After a week he ran off into the woods while clawing his own eyes out... so maybe keep it in the closet at night instead, eh?"

attributes.name: Corrupted Remnant
attributes.description: "After the breach closed, this axe is all that remained. The corruption upon it appears to sing as you wield it."
attributes.parsed_description: "After the breach closed, this axe is all that remained. The corruption upon it appears to sing as you wield it."

attributes.name: Corrupted Resistance
attributes.description: “Walk swiftly and carry a big hammer.”
attributes.parsed_description: “Walk swiftly and carry a big hammer.”

attributes.name: Corrupted Sight
attributes.description: "It slowly wound the cloth around its face until it could not see. Still, it knew I was there."
attributes.parsed_description: "It slowly wound the cloth around its face until it could not see. Still, it knew I was there."

attributes.name: Corrupted Skewer
attributes.description: "The corrupted do not treat us as humans. They see us only as pigs to be slaughtered."
attributes.parsed_description: "The corrupted do not treat us as humans. They see us only as pigs to be slaughtered."

attributes.name: Corruption Infused Longbow
attributes.description: "Corruption seeps from the wood around the bow, oozing from every bow. Knocking an arrow causes the corruption to jut towards the fresh wood, trying to corrupt every last splinter of it."
attributes.parsed_description: "Corruption seeps from the wood around the bow, oozing from every bow. Knocking an arrow causes the corruption to jut towards the fresh wood, trying to corrupt every last splinter of it."

attributes.name: Corruption's Flame
attributes.description: "We shall wash over this world like a raging wildfire. Nothing will be left when we are finished."
attributes.parsed_description: "We shall wash over this world like a raging wildfire. Nothing will be left when we are finished."

attributes.name: Corruption's Herald
attributes.description: "Corruption rises. The storm comes for you."
attributes.parsed_description: "Corruption rises. The storm comes for you."

attributes.name: Corruption's Rebirth
attributes.description: "Your dark rebirth shall grant you powers beyond your comprehension."
attributes.parsed_description: "Your dark rebirth shall grant you powers beyond your comprehension."

attributes.name: Corruption's Resurgance
attributes.description: "We thought that corruption was gone, dying a slow death. And then out of nowhere, it erupted."
attributes.parsed_description: "We thought that corruption was gone, dying a slow death. And then out of nowhere, it erupted."

attributes.name: Corsair's Fire Staff
attributes.name_with_affixes: Corsair's Fire Staff of the Scholar
attributes.description: "The business of piracy is predictable. Pirates, on the otherhand, are anything but."
attributes.parsed_description: "The business of piracy is predictable. Pirates, on the otherhand, are anything but."

attributes.description: "The business of piracy is predictable. Pirates, on the otherhand, are anything but."

attributes.name: Courtier's Crescent Staff
attributes.description: "My wisdom will lead this kingdom to greatness, my liege."
attributes.parsed_description: "My wisdom will lead this kingdom to greatness, my liege."

attributes.name: Courtly Rifle
attributes.description: "If your nobles aren't in line, show them who's boss."
attributes.parsed_description: "If your nobles aren't in line, show them who's boss."

attributes.name: Courtly Warhammer
attributes.description: "More fitting to be stowed in a throne room than be used in battle."
attributes.parsed_description: "More fitting to be stowed in a throne room than be used in battle."

attributes.name: Covenant Adjudicator Bow
attributes.description: A well made bow for Covenant Adjudicators.
attributes.parsed_description: A well made bow for Covenant Adjudicators.
